The project was developed for integration locally within the CS curriculum at UC Berkeley but with the intent and design adaptability to expand usage to other curriculums and universities in an effort to promote equality of opportunity throughout academia.

Also explored exam-level equality by considering the omission of a traditional time-limit for exams.
